column4: Hi. I just setup a server with Ubuntu. Installed Lynx to view some html documentation, and it's displayed awkwardly. My install is default utf-8, but what am I supposed to do? reconfigure lynx?

Hi. I'm a Slack veteran actually migrating to Ubuntu, which I like very much. I mainly used KDE until now, but GNOME seems to be better integrated (found a couple of nasty bugs in Kubuntu). Q: can I still use the odd KDE app in GNOME?
there are a few apps, such as music players that may not work so well.
sh...... because I'm a big fan of Juk
